page.title: 02FARMING
page.content: IN{BRUNTON}AREA THERE ARE ABOUT{6 {FARMS}AND A FEW{SMALL HOLDINGS.}ON EACH{FARM}THERE ARE DIFFERENT TYPES OF {TRACTORS}AND{FORKLIFTS.}THE AVERAGE ACREAGE OF THE{FARMS}IS{410 ACRES.}THE AVERAGE AMOUNT OF LAND USED FOR{ARABLE IS{350 ACRES.}THE AVERAGE AMOUNT OF {GRASSLAND}IS{250 ACRES.}THE AVERAGE AMOUNT OF{STOCK}ON EACH FARM IS{45. SOME OF THE FARMS ARE OWNED BY THE FARMERS AND OTHERS ARE{TENANTED.}THE MAIN BREEDS OF{STOCK}USED ARE {HEREFORDS,BLACK FACED EWES,FRIESIANS, {ABERDEEN ANGUSES,CROSS HEREFORDS}AND {CHAROLAIS.}THE MAIN TYPES OF CROPS GROWN ARE{WINTER BARLEY,SPRING {BARLEY,WHEAT,OATS,TURNIPS,PEAS, {POTATOES,OIL SEED RAPE AND GRASS.}MOST OF THE LAND IN THIS AREA IS{FLATTISH, SO IT IS MOSTLY USED FOR{ARABLE.
